duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain all cash-related activities, including timely cash posting, deferred revenue reconciliation, and support for daily, weekly, and monthly accounting tasks.
Provide support for month-end and year-end closing processes, including deferred revenue reconciliations, balance sheet account reconciliation, and Bank statement reconciliation.
Assist with preparing monthly balance sheet, income, and cash flow statements.
Maintain the general ledger system and perform general cost accounting and payable duties for the organization.
File sales tax and other taxes monthly and quarterly, and provide assistance to outside auditors for the annual audit.
Contribute to the development and ongoing improvement of accounting policies and procedures, and participate in ad hoc projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Accounting or Finance (preferred)
